about.first: I am a 22 years old web developer from Corrientes, Argentina. I discovered programming 2 years ago, and since then I have been training my skills with the MERN Stack, while also learning technologies such as NextJS, Typescript, SQL Databases, and more.
about.second: I have 1 year of experience as a freelancer, working on E-Commerces, Landing Pages and Learning Management Systems.
about.third: I am confident that my skills and experience makes me a valuable asset to any team, and I am excited to continue to develop my skills and experience in the IT industry.
